author: Rational Animations
description:
If superintelligent AI could cause human extinction, why don’t we simply stop building ever more advanced AI? This proposal is widely debated. In this video, we outline the main arguments, practical difficulties, and proposed responses.

title: Should we pause AI? Here’s the debate.
